arts.ttl: Wrexham boss heaps praise on to Wigan Athletic - '...in and around the play-offs...'
arts.sum: Wrexham boss Phil Parkinson claimed Wigan Athletic are in a false league position following the goalless draw between the two sides at the Brick Community Stadium on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief muses what might have been against Wrexham
arts.sum: Ryan Lowe believes only 'that little bit of quality' prevented Wigan Athletic pulling off what would have been a deserved victory against automatic promotion favourites Wrexham.

arts.ttl: Birmingham win League One title after Wrexham draw
arts.sum: Birmingham City are confirmed champions of League One after Wrexham are held to a goalless draw at Wigan Athletic.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic frustrate automatic promotion favourites Wrexham
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic were very good value for their point as the visit of League One promotion favourites Wrexham ended in stalemate at the Brick Community Stadium.

arts.ttl: Wrexham held to draw at Wigan
EFL LIVE on Sky! Leeds, Sheff U & Wrexham face crunch promotion clashes
arts.sum: Leeds looked to be slipping, but enjoyed a massive win at Middlesbrough on Tuesday night as the other two slipped. In the last seven days, Sheffield United, Leeds and Burnley have all enjoyed the joy of being at the summit.

arts.ttl: Saturday's League One predictions including Wigan Athletic vs. Wrexham
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's League One fixtures, including Wigan Athletic vs. Wrexham.

arts.ttl: Only Wrexham-style Hollywood money can bridge Premier League gap after meek relegation battle
arts.sum: Last season in the Premier League, all three promoted teams were relegated straight back down to the Championship and the same looks likely to happen in this campaign - showing how hard it is to bridge the gap between the two divisions

arts.ttl: Wrexham midfielder's opinion on Ryan Reynolds shows what he's really like away from cameras
arts.sum: Wrexham are closing in on promotion from League One and A-list co-owner Ryan Reynolds gave the players an inspirational speech before one of their recent matches

arts.ttl: 'I was in Ryan Reynolds' Wrexham huddle before match â€“ I won't repeat what he told us'
arts.sum: Wrexham midfielder Ollie Rathbone has lifted the lid on a speech given by Ryan Reynolds to his team's players ahead of a crunch game in their race for League One promotion
